alert.note: Alert for Columbus (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 16 at 8:37PM EDT until May 16 at 9:15PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... Northwestern Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... Northeastern Marion County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 915 PM EDT. * At 837 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Gapway, or near Mullins, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Mullins, Tabor City, Loris, Gapway, Sidney, Allsbrook, Green Sea and Loris Community Hospital. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
